title: Bug 7330 - Make more actions available on text selection
description: Bug 7330 - Make more actions available on text selection. I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' in the context menu. I had to switch to the Outline view to find it. It seems that the actions are currently distributed based on personal taste, which is confusing to users. All actions related to the editor should be reachable directly from the editor, without having to switch views.
OB: The 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is not available in the context menu.
EB: I expected the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action to be available in the context menu.
SR:
1. Open the editor.
2. Select some text.
3. Right-click to open the context menu.
4. Verify if the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is available in the context menu.
